text: The Hyundai County is a minibus made by Hyundai. It was launched in 1998 as a successor to the Chorus. It is primarily used as city buses and tourist buses. == History == The Hyundai County was first made in 1998 to replace the Hyundai Chorus. The first County was built from 1998 to 2004. A new version called the e-County was made in 2004. The bus got a facelift in 2008, and a small update in 2012. An electric version, called the County Electric, was shown at the Hyundai Truck & Bus Business Fair in 2019. A new facelift version, the County New Breeze, was made in 2020. ==Markets== The Hyundai County is mainly sold in South Korea where it is popular as a city bus and tourist bus the Hyundai County is also sold in some African countries Middle East and Southeast Asia. ==References== Category:Minibuses Chorus
title: Hyundai County
